directions: Thoroughly mix cream cheese, lemon juice, minced onion, horseradish, salt, and liquid smoke in a bowl. Fold salmon through the mixture to distribute evenly; shape into a ball.
Refrigerate ball until firm, about 30 minutes.
Spread crackers onto a plate. Roll ball in crackers to coat. Keep chilled until serving.
ingredients: 2 (7 ounce) pouches skinless, boneless salmon, drained and flaked
1 sleeve buttery round crackers (such as Ritz®), crushed
title: Susan's Smokey Salmon Ball
